h2_title: Where to Find the Yellow-Robed Squire
content: After sobering up, the Drunken Boar will then head to the Crouching Tiger Temple, and there request that you get him some tasty Jade Lotus -- which can be harvested in most pools of water.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow-Robed_Squire.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow-Robed Squire', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Yellow-Robed Squire'.
The content is as follows:
After sobering up, the Drunken Boar will then head to the Crouching Tiger Temple, and there request that you get him some tasty Jade Lotus -- which can be harvested in most pools of water.
